org.ibmstreams.bigsql.mapping

Class HVal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ibmstreams.bigsql.mapping.HVal

  • public class HVal
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    sbartkowski

    Single value to be put into the HBase cell. Should correspond to ColumnMapping class.

    Constructor is protected, values should constructed by means of static method.

    • Method Summary
